Stallex gets to the shuttle, grabs more parts and gets back.

OOC: I would love to have him interact with someone, but noones around 
so don't start complaining (I guess I am getting alittle ahead of 
both of us there).  By the way how do we right bios for our factions 
(it seems like only a few factions have them but I plan to go all out 
with the Geotrons.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> I can't believe I got that wrong! I want to be an
> Archeologist (an even harder word to spell I need to
> get a dictionary), and I have a theory about where
> Atlantis is.  By the way if I find a way to incoporate
> it into the game and I admit where my theory puts it
> no ones going to copy me (granted it was only suppose
> to sink in 10,000 B.C. more or less and some people
> think an extra 0 was added on over the ages_/
> 
> --- x_rauq_x <x_rauq_x@y...> wrote:
> > No nukes, the Infecticon cannon can't be fired any
> > more, Iron Fist's 
> > weapon doesn't get used, (don't ya' hate it when the
> > other side 
> > feels that you don't need a nuke, or an extrememly
> > large weapon for 
> > that matter). The word you are looking for is most 
> > likely "Atlantis". Unless you can convince someone
> > to let you level 
> > their base, you're not going to get permission from
> > me.
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@y...>
> > wrote:
> > > OOC: What about the main turret on the Iron Fist,
> > and
> > > that cannon thing the Infecticons have (don't ya'
> > hate

> > nuke
> > > you could only use once and overall would be less
> > > damaging. Granted I would momentarily hold the
> > power
> > > of life and death over any one base (or maybe I
> > should

> > got

> > to

> > lost
> > > could be rebuilt.
> >
